abstract: JPMorgan Chase’s investment banking unit announced a series of top management changes on Tuesday, including the departure of Bill Winters, the unit’s co-chief executive.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase’s investment banking unit announced a series of top management changes on Tuesday, including the departure of Bill Winters, the unit’s co-chief executive.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase‘s investment banking unit announced a series of top management changes on Tuesday, including the appointment of James E. Staley as chief executive and the departure of William Winters, who had been the unit’s co-chief executive for the last five years.

abstract: DealBook offers a primer on Jes Staley, whose move to become JPMorgan’s sole investment banking chief suggests he’s a prime candidate to lead the entire firm one day.
snippet: DealBook offers a primer on Jes Staley, whose move to become JPMorgan’s sole investment banking chief suggests he’s a prime candidate to lead the entire firm one day.
lead_paragraph: With his unexpected move to become head of investment banking at JPMorgan Chase, James E. Staley is raising his profile on Wall Street — and emerging as a contender to succeed the firm’s chief executive, Jamie Dimon, sometime down the line.

headline.main: JPMorgan’s Next Investment Bank Chief: A Primer
